title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama: chat, generate, embed, pull, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; same features as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use any Ollama model as an LLM or chat component.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model manager, multi-user, dark/light themes).

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-built interactive CLI wrapper with history, syntax highlighting, and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a local GitHub Copilot alternative.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official container images (CPU & CUDA) published to Docker Hub.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.0 integration to use Ollama models for generation or chat in pipelines.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM client for Ollama (Android compatible) with synchronous, async, and reactive APIs.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem wrapping the Ollama REST API with ActiveModel-style interfaces.

title: ollama-chatbot-ui
summary: Next.js chatbot template that connects to a local Ollama instance via the JS SDK.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community-driven recipes: function-calling, vision, embeddings, fine-tuning, and edge deployments.

title: ollama-gpt-crawler
summary: Crawl any website, feed pages to Ollama, and ask questions about the content offline.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that brings any Ollama model to your server with slash commands.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Lightweight Slack bot using Socket Mode to interact with Ollama models in channels or DMs.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds an Ollama sidebar for summarizing notes, brainstorming, and Q&A.

title: ollama-npm
summary: Official npm package: JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama with zero dependencies.

title: ollama PyPI
summary: Official PyPI package: Python client for Ollama with sync and async APIs.
